Body:
"""Test bearing calculation"""
for ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2, bear in [(0, 0, 0, 1, 0), (0, 0, 180, 90, 0), (0,
    0, 179.99999, 0, 90), (0, 0, 180.00001, 0, -90)]:
    ans = at.bear(ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2)
    assert_almost_equal(ans, bear, err_msg=
        '{0:5.2f},{1:5.2f} <-> {2:5.2f},{3:5.2f} == {4:g} != {5:g}'.format(
        ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2, bear, ans))
